Question: As of 2009, this person lives in Malibu, California, when not on the road.
Hints: On November 4, 1971 this person recorded "George Jackson", which he released a week later.
The event coincided with the start of the Gulf War against Saddam Hussein, and this person performed his song "Masters of War".
They say, "this person's no prophet." They just can't handle it.
